email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Instagram Policy Violation Notice

Dear Instagram User,

We regret to inform you that your account has been flagged for violating our community guidelines. Our system has detected suspicious activity on your account, including the posting of inappropriate content and engaging in spammy behavior.

In order to avoid any further actions being taken against your account, we urge you to appeal this decision by clicking on the link below and filling out the appeal form. Failure to do so within 48 hours may result in your account being permanently disabled.

[Link to Fake Appeal Form]

We understand that mistakes can happen, and we are here to help you rectify the situation. Please take this matter seriously and comply with our request to avoid any inconvenience in the future.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
The Instagram Team
